sentences.en: A problem for manufacturers is that lighter cars tend to be noisy.
sentences.cn: 制造商遇到的一个问题是重量较轻的汽车往往噪音大。

sentences.en: Any signs of discontent tend to be magnified and overanalyzed.
sentences.cn: 稍有不满便会被上纲上线。

sentences.en: Charles tends towards obesity.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯有肥胖倾向。

sentences.en: Cities, if unrestricted, tend to coalesce into bigger and bigger conurbations.
sentences.cn: 如果不加限制，城市往往会联合发展成越来越大的集合城市。

sentences.en: His short stories tend to be weak on plot.
sentences.cn: 他的短篇小说往往情节牵强。

sentences.en: I tend to forget things unless I mark them down.
sentences.cn: 除非把事情记下来，否则我常常会忘事。

sentences.en: I tend to get very uptight during a match.
sentences.cn: 比赛时我总会紧张得不行。

sentences.en: I tend to stick to fresh fruit for pudding.
sentences.cn: 我一直坚持用新鲜水果做甜点。

sentences.en: Men tend to put on weight in middle age.
sentences.cn: 男人到了中年往往会发福。

sentences.en: My car tends to overheat in the summer.
sentences.cn: 我的车夏天经常会变得过热。

sentences.en: Older mothers tend to be too idealistic about the pleasures of motherhood.
sentences.cn: 较年长的母亲往往对身为人母的乐趣过于理想化。

sentences.en: People tend to need less sleep as they get older.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长，人需要的睡眠通常会减少。

sentences.en: Reports of the plot of this unusual film tend to excite revulsion.
sentences.cn: 有关这部不同寻常电影的情节的报道常常令人生厌。

sentences.en: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.cn: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

sentences.en: Television companies tend to censor bad language in feature films.
sentences.cn: 电视公司往往会在审查故事片时删去其中的粗话。

sentences.en: The most acquisitive firms tend to be engineering groups.
sentences.cn: 最贪得无厌的公司往往是工程队。

sentences.en: They tend to buy cheap processed foods like canned chicken and macaroni.
sentences.cn: 他们往往会买便宜的加工食品，像鸡肉罐头和通心粉之类的。

sentences.en: to tend to someone's needs
We tend to imagine that the Victorians were very prim and proper.
sentences.cn: 我们倾向于把维多利亚时代的人想象得非常古板、中规中矩。

sentences.en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

sentences.en: White wines tend to gain depth of colour with age.
sentences.cn: 白葡萄酒年头愈久，颜色愈深。

words.tran_cn: 宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向
有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
温柔的；柔软的；脆弱的；幼稚的；难对付的
提供，偿还；使…变嫩；是…变柔软

trans.tran_cn: 往往会，倾向于，个人认为，护理，照料，招待
trans.tran_en: to look after someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 照管， 照料， 护理
trans.tran_en: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again
